sentences: Tasemel on tähtis teada oma piire.
Meie töö on kõrgetasemeline ja professionaalne.
Sellel projektil on väga madal tase.
context: The Estonian word 'tasemel' is related to the concept of level or standard. It can be used to describe the quality, standard, or level of something. The word appears to be in the adessive case (ending -l), which typically indicates location or means/way, suggesting it could mean 'on a level' or 'at a standard'. In the examples provided, it's used to talk about knowing one's limits (on a level), high-quality work (high-level), and low project standards (low level).
